title: Rissa Kerguelen
description: Originally published as two books, namely "Rissa Kerguelen" and the sequel "The Long View"."Tomorrow's ultimate woman on a star-flung crusade of vengeance and victoryAt five, they slaughtered her parents and doomed her to slavery.At seventeen, she escaped from earth as a million-dollar fugitive.At eighteen, she commanded an army in outer space."
author: F.M. Busby
